FuncDef: This command allows the operator to set the priority of the Linktrace Response Message (ETH-LTR) from a MIP for this association.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the priority of the Linktrace Response Message (ETH-LTR) from a MIP. The "defer" value is only supported under the default-domain context and causes mip-ltr-priority to inherit values from the global read-only-system values. Values-0 to 7, defer.
